description: 10 curated demo cases per judge recommendations

cases.name: Simple 2-item problem
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 10. Available items: [{"name": "A", "weight": 5, "value": 10}, {"name": "B", "weight": 3, "value": 8}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: Tight capacity constraint
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 15. Available items: [{"name": "X", "weight": 8, "value": 20}, {"name": "Y", "weight": 7, "value": 18}, {"name": "Z", "weight": 5, "value": 12}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: All items fit
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 50. Available items: [{"name": "item1", "weight": 5, "value": 10}, {"name": "item2", "weight": 8, "value": 15}, {"name": "item3", "weight": 3, "value": 7}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: All items too heavy
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 5. Available items: [{"name": "Heavy1", "weight": 10, "value": 100}, {"name": "Heavy2", "weight": 15, "value": 150}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: Single item selection
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 20. Available items: [{"name": "OnlyOne", "weight": 15, "value": 50}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: 5 items with complex tradeoffs
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 25. Available items: [{"name": "A", "weight": 5, "value": 10}, {"name": "B", "weight": 10, "value": 25}, {"name": "C", "weight": 8, "value": 18}, {"name": "D", "weight": 3, "value": 6}, {"name": "E", "weight": 7, "value": 15}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: Items with equal values
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 12. Available items: [{"name": "Light", "weight": 3, "value": 10}, {"name": "Medium", "weight": 6, "value": 10}, {"name": "Heavy", "weight": 9, "value": 10}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: Large capacity problem
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 100. Available items: [{"name": "obj_0", "weight": 12, "value": 30}, {"name": "obj_1", "weight": 15, "value": 40}, {"name": "obj_2", "weight": 20, "value": 55}, {"name": "obj_3", "weight": 8, "value": 20}, {"name": "obj_4", "weight": 25, "value": 70}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.

cases.name: Budget + quality constraint variant
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 30. Available items: [{"name": "Premium", "weight": 10, "value": 50}, {"name": "Standard", "weight": 8, "value": 30}, {"name": "Budget", "weight": 5, "value": 15}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity. Additional constraint: Total value must be at least 60.

cases.name: Intentionally infeasible (for testing)
cases.problem: Knapsack capacity: 0. Available items: [{"name": "Item", "weight": 1, "value": 10}]. Select items to maximize value without exceeding capacity.
cases.note: Zero capacity - should return empty solution

usage: These cases cover: simple problems, tight constraints, edge cases (empty solution, single item), complex tradeoffs, variants, and intentionally infeasible cases for comprehensive testing.
